mapper.insert: insert into task_test (tt_id, task_id, user_id, status) values (#{ttId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
